strings.ready_failed: __amount__ request(s) failed, check browser console for more information
strings.ready_serverOutage: Augmented Steam servers are currently overloaded
strings.wsgf_unsupported: Denna poäng tilldelas spel som har inget stöd för __type__.  Spelet kan vara ospelbart __type__, eller bilden sträcks för att passa i fönstret.  Rätt bildförhållande bevaras inte.
strings.wsgf_gold: Denna medalj utdelas till spel som har fått perfekta poäng från WSGF för deras __type__ stöd och __type__ Certifierad.
strings.wsgf_silver: Denna medalj utdelas till spel som har fått beräknade betyget B för deras __type__ stöd.  Alla dessa spel är utan större brister, men har åtminstone en fläck som förhindrar ett perfekt resultat.
strings.wsgf_limited: Denna poäng tilldelas spel som har fått en beräknad klass C för deras __type__ stöd.  Alla dessa spel har viss __type__ stöd men har betydande problem.
strings.itad_info_itadSteam: Connecting Augmented Steam with IsThereAnyDeal allows you to apply Augmented Steam's highlighting and tagging to games in your Waitlist and Collection even if you don't have them on Steam.
strings.itad_info_steamItad: Furthermore, it allows you to import games from your Steam Library and/or Wishlist to IsThereAnyDeal, for improved accuracy (e.g. DLCs or unlisted games). Currently this feature can only add titles, not remove them, so it's not the replacement for IsThereAnyDeal's integrated sync, but an addition to it.
strings.register_owned: Detta Steam-kontot äger redan produkten/produkterna i erbjudandet.
strings.register_notavail: Beklagar, men denna produkt är inte tillgänglig att köpas i ditt land. Din produktnyckel har inte aktiverats.
strings.register_invalid: Produktkoden är inte giltig. Vänligen kontrollera om du har skrivit fel.
strings.register_already: Produktkoden har redan blivit aktiverad av ett annat Steam-konto.
strings.register_dlc: Produktkoden du har skrivit in kräver ägarskap av en annan produkt innan aktivering.
strings.register_wallet: Koden du har skrivit in är ett Steam-gåvorkort eller Steam-plånbokskod
strings.register_toomany: Det har varit för många senaste aktivering försök från detta konto.  Vänta och försök igen senare.
strings.register_default: Ett oväntat fel uppstod. Din produktkod har inte aktiverats. Vänligen vänta 30 minuter och försök igen.
strings.wl_hiddenTooltip: Apps that have been removed/unlisted and are not visible on wishlists. Click for details.
strings.wl_removeTitle: Remove this item from your wishlist?
strings.wl_removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove 'appid __appid__' from your wishlist?
strings.userNote_notEnoughSpace: Not enough space to save note
strings.userNote_notEnoughSpaceDesc: Augmented Steam can't save any more user notes since your used storage adapter doesn't allow more data to be saved (attempting to use ~__perc__% of the storage capacity).
strings.userNote_closeOnStorage: You are running close on storage
strings.userNote_closeOnStorageDesc: Augmented Steam is close to not being able to save any more user notes (~__perc__% storage usage) with your current storage adapter.
strings.userNote_storageWarningDesc: You can choose to store your user notes in a local database (without synchronization) or continue using the storage method provided by your browser (where new notes can only be added if you delete some old).
strings.userNote_syncInfo_1: You can sync your notes between Augmented Steam and IsThereAnyDeal. If you enable automatic sync, notes will be periodically fetched from ITAD. Edits via Augmented Steam will be mirrored to ITAD immediately.
strings.userNote_syncInfo_2: You can also manually push or pull notes between Augmented Steam and IsThereAnyDeal. We advise you to do so before enabling automatic sync, to ensure the correct version of the note is used, in case you have different notes stored for the same game.
strings.userNote_syncInfo_3: You can see all your notes stored in the Notes and Tags section on IsThereAnyDeal.
strings.userNote_syncErrorUnknown: ITAD does not know this game
strings.queue_newTooltip: Remove this product from your queue and start a new queue.
strings.workshop_subscribeConfirm: Are you sure you want to subscribe to all __count__ workshop items with these filters?
strings.workshop_subscribeLoading: Subscribing to __i__/__count__ workshop items, please wait...
strings.workshop_unsubscribeConfirm: Are you sure you want to unsubscribe to all __count__ workshop items with these filters?
strings.workshop_unsubscribeLoading: Unsubscribing from __i__/__count__ workshop items, please wait...
strings.workshop_finished: Finished! __success__ successful, __fail__ failed. Click OK to refresh the page
